comments: She is a very nice and fair teacher. I wanted to take her for comp II if she taught it. I took her online and it was very straight forward and easy to understand and good on time. There are only 2-3 things due a week and each assignment takes 10-30 minutes. Very good for an online teacher. NO doubt is she the best online teacher out there.

I took this class online but she has been a great teacher for me! She\'s easy on the grading and doesn\'t expect you to write a new york times best seller. As long as you show interest and effort this will be an easy class.
Ms. Bowman is an amazing teacher. Best teacher yet!!!
She was very engaging in a subject I wasn\'t excited about. Fair, kind, and respectful. She made things interesting. I recommend her highly.
I took this class on-line. She was particular but fair. Very organized. If you follow instructions there is no reason you won\'t do well.
She expects students to be ready to learn and be interested in English. She was helpful and interesting throughout the quarter. She pushes students to believe they can write!
She can be strict, but is always willing to lend help if needed. As long as you follow her instructions, there\'s no reason you can\'t get a good grade.
Completely inflexible, harsh grader. Over half the class dropped out.
